Step 1. download magic disc (free) and install it to use as a disc emulator 
Step 2. after the game installs, go to the game directory(should look like this:

C:\Program Files (x86)\Activision\Call of Duty - Black Ops on a 64 bit OS
C:\Program Files\Activision\Call of Duty - Black Ops on 32bit

Install the direct x manually

Step 3.

Now go to the emulated cd /dvd drive.
Right Click & open. Look for the folder called crack. you will see the files in that folder. copy them to your game directory(C:\Program Files (x86)\Activision\Call of Duty - Black Ops) replace when asked.

Now enjoy the game.
